text: you need to clear your *local storage* for `<http://app.HubSpot.com|app.HubSpot.com>`

Hey, everybody, I need your help with the design manager, I'm starting with the practicum for cms developers but I can find the designer manager in the marketing tab. Am I missing something? I'm in my sandbox account but I can't seem to find the design manager link.

<https://spin.d.pr/FKRkqx+>

under marketing > files and templates

There’s also a google chrome extension which adds handy shortcuts to all the areas developers commonly need to access
That's where I'm looking but for me the option it's not there
a HubSpotter would have to verify, but I don’t think you have a developer sandbox account then. It’s likely you got a trial of one of the marketing account types instead
thank you, I didn't have the permission in my account.
